name: The Lost Gifts
description:
As the lads dream about their perfect gift, Grey Mecha Santa Mannequin rushes to deliver the last of the missing presents.

Controls

Left Click -> Move / Drop item

E -> Pick up gift

I -> Inventory

F -> Use Candy Cane (restore stamina)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits

Voice Lines -> Jamhatts

Emotional Support -> ProbablyDave, Thisisjase

Leg-end -> HonestDan

Music -> pixabay.com -- Chirstmas Knocking to the Door -- Lesfm

Houses -> MadHoundGames 

Foliage / Rocks -> Tiny Talisman Games

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Known Bugs

Inventory Order switches when trying to drop incorrect item at house

Mouse movement locks on start game after game complete

Gift to deliver icon disappears when attempting to deliver incorrect item

Sliders do not track sound
